fixes.name: Delta Down T
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level alias: Tableau's [Delta Down T] maps directly to the column [DELTA_DOWN]; create a calculated column that returns that column value.

fixes.name: Delta Down T GBP
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level multiplication: Tableau's [Delta Down T]*[TO_GBP] is converted to DAX by multiplying the corresponding columns in the same table.

fixes.name: MUSH Delta Down T GBP
fixes.dax_expression: IF('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[CURRENCY] = "GBP", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T GBP], 0)
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level conditional: Tableau IF ... THEN ... ELSE ... END is mapped to DAX IF(condition, true_value, false_value). Returns the GBP delta when CURRENCY is "GBP", otherwise 0.
